questions.question: The Warsaw Pact was similar to NATO in that it. . .

choices.answer: was a defensive military alliance.
included both European and North American nations.
was formed because of the weakness of the League of Nations.
was formed to safeguard against Soviet Union aggression.

questions.question: The Warsaw Pact was formed in response to. . .

choices.answer: UN involvement in the Korean War.
the admittance of West Germany into NATO.
the downing of US spy plane in the Soviet Union.
the construction of the Berlin Wall.

questions.question: This policy stated that the US would use all means including the use of nuclear weapons to protects its interests.

choices.answer: containment
brinkmanship
mutual assured destruction
sputnik

questions.question: The Soviet Union's launching of sputnik, was alarming in that the Soviet Union. . .

choices.answer: now had a powerful weapon in space.
could now spy on the US.
had a faster means of delivering a nuclear strike.
could communicate faster with its naval forces.

questions.question: As a result of the U2 incident. . .

choices.answer: both the USSR and US were allowed to spy on each other.
both superpowers began to reduce their number of nuclear weapons.
the US began developing powerful rockets.
tensions grew worse between the two superpowers.
